tool_description: Validates and cleanses location data including coordinates, addresses, and geographic references for accuracy and completeness.

coordinates.description: Array of coordinate pairs to validate [lat1, lon1, lat2, lon2, ...]

validation_level.description: Validation strictness: basic, standard, or strict

error_messages: Invalid coordinates array: Must contain an even number of values representing lat/lon pairs
Out of bounds coordinates: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180
Too many coordinates: Maximum 500 coordinate pairs (1000 values) allowed per request
usage: Provide an array of coordinates as alternating latitude and longitude values. Set validation_level to control the strictness of validation checks.

invalid_coordinates.description: Array of coordinates that failed validation

total_validated.description: Total number of coordinate pairs processed

success_rate.description: Percentage of coordinates that passed validation
